start.welcome: Welcome to the world of Pokémon!
start.pick: To begin playing, choose one of these pokémon with the `/pick <pokemon>` command

pokemon.title: Your Pokemon
pokemon.footer: Showing {{idx}} - {{last_idx}} of {{totalPokemon}} Pokémon matching this search. [ Page {{page}} of {{max}} ]

select.title: Your Pokemon
select.invalid_pokemon: Please provide a valid Pokémon ID.

info.not_selected: You don't have any Pokémon selected or available.
info.unregistered: This Pokémon has not been registered in the database. Please contact an admin for more help.

catch.caught: Congrats, you just caught yourself a level {{level}} {{shiny}}{{pokemon}}

config.invalid_use: Invalid command usage. Try `@Pokedi config server redirect_spawns #channel, #channel2` or `@Pokedi config channel toggle_spawns [true/1|false/0]` or `@Pokedi config check settings` or `@Pokedi config check help`.
config.manager: You need the 'Manage Server' permission to use this command.
config.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
config.no_valid_channels: No valid text channels were found in your input.
config.success_redirect: Spawns will now be redirected to the specified channels.
config.spawns_cleared: Spawn redirection has been cleared for this server.
config.spawns_config_notfound: No spawn redirection was configured for this server.
config.language_set: Successfully set `{{language}}` as the language of this Server
config.language_set_channel: Successfully set `{{language}}` as the language of this Channel
config.spawns_enabled: Spawns are now enabled in this channel.
config.spawns_already_enabled: Spawns were already enabled in this channel.
config.spawns_disabled: Spawns are now disabled in this channel.
config.config_description: Showing settings for this server and the current channel (<#{{channelId}}>).
config.help_description: Use this command to configure various settings for your server and channels.
config.help_server_settings_value: Configure settings that apply to the entire server.
config.redirect_spawns_value:
Slash: `/config server redirect_spawns channels:#channel1 #channel2`
Mention: `@Pokedi config server redirect_spawns #channel1 #channel2`
Mention: `@Pokedi config s rs #channel1 #channel2`
Redirects all Pokémon spawns to the specified channels.
config.clear_redirects_value:
Slash: `/config server clear_redirects`
Mention: `@Pokedi config server clear_redirects`
Mention: `@Pokedi config s cr`
Clears any active spawn redirection for the server.
config.channel_specific_value: Configure settings for the current channel.
config.toggle_spawns_value:
Slash: `/config channel toggle_spawns enabled:true`
Mention: `@Pokedi config channel toggle_spawns true/false`
Mention: `@Pokedi config c ts true/false`
Enables or disables Pokémon spawns in the current channel.
config.view_settings_value:
Slash: `/config check settings`
Mention: `@Pokedi config check settings`
Mention: `@Pokedi config a`
Displays all current server and channel configurations.
config.get_config_help_value:
Slash: `/config check help`
Mention: `@Pokedi config check help`
Displays this help message for the config command.

default.no_started: You haven't started your adventure! `/pick` someone to travel with!
